p: Additionally, while most host species carry only one lineage of SIV, mandrils and mustached monkeys carry 2 and 3 lineages of SIV, respectively [ 28â€“ 31]. In agreement with these previous studies, SIV mnd-1 and SIV mnd-2 do not always cluster together in the phylogeny; the same is true for SIV mus-1, SIV mus-2, and SIV mus-3, indicating that each of these viral lineages likely has a unique origin. This stands in stark contrast to baboons, which have only been infected by an SIV via a single documented spillover event [ 24].
